blogPost.title:
$AMC is up more than 200% pre-market.  
 
The stock is trading at its highest price since May 2019. https://t.co/KgNjbzL4KP
blogPost.author: Stocktwits

localize.full_text:
$AMC盘前涨幅超过200%。 
 
该股的交易价格为2019年5月以来的最高价。https://t.co/KgNjbzL4KP。

$AMC盤前漲幅超過200%。 
 
該股的交易價格爲2019年5月以來的最高價。https://t.co/KgNjbzL4KP。

previous.excerpt: Learn everything about the undocumented secrets in the popular Laravel framework, that makes you a better and more efficient developer.
previous.title: Laravel Secrets - Learn everything about the undocumented secrets in Laravel

localize.description: 学习关于流行的Laravel框架中的所有未被记录的秘密,让你成为一个更好更有效的开发者.
localize.tagline: 了解Laravel中的一切无证秘密。

localize.description: 學習關於流行的Laravel框架中的所有未被記錄的祕密,讓你成爲一個更好更有效的開發者.

next.excerpt: Flinkit! provides remote teams with fun and creative cooperation opportunities to enhance teamwork and trust. Teams can compete at the same time as they follow the carefully designed storyline solving highly visual tasks and riddles.
next.title: The Firm by Flinkit! - Web-hosted team building mission for remote teams

localize.description: Flinkit！为远程团队提供趣味性和创造性的合作机会，增强团队合作和信任。团队可以在竞争的同时，按照精心设计的故事情节解决高度可视化的任务和谜语。
localize.tagline: 远程团队的网络托管团队建设任务。

localize.description: Flinkit！爲遠程團隊提供趣味性和創造性的合作機會，增強團隊合作和信任。團隊可以在競爭的同時，按照精心設計的故事情節解決高度可視化的任務和謎語。
localize.tagline: 遠程團隊的網絡託管團隊建設任務。
